group_1.narration: I just...wanted to change myself, to stop being@a shut-in...
I'd been fooling myself by pretending to be@something I'm not, but...
Shigure and Hagumu said they'd support me.
That's why@I'm going to clear up the strange problem in Takarazaki@and let them know who I am as a Magical Girl.@I'll turn the fake me into the real me.
There could be another accident today,@or there could be another incident...
That person could be the culprit...@Or, that person who just passed by could be the culprit...
We never know what's going to happen,@so we have to be ready to handle anything.

group_1.textLeft: Sorry that I'm the one who's always late.

group_1.textRight: ...It's fine, you're in Daito...which is farther away@than I am...
...More importantly, let's search as soon as possible...@We don't want to waste time...

group_1.textLeft: Right.

group_1.textCenter: Shigurin and Hagurin were right.@You two really are from Kamihama.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
You're the girl from the other day...

group_1.textRight: Hey, 'bout the last time when we talked about@cooperating... Why don't we try it now?

group_1.textLeft: .........[wait:0.8][chara:305101:lipSynch_1]Excuse me?
I have no clue what kind of turn of events this is,@but...
Aren't you the one who turned us down?

group_1.textRight: Yup, I did, but I had a change of heart.

group_1.textLeft: ...Why?

group_1.textRight: Because you two are working on a@self-improvement project.
And you're spreading the word about your@Magical Girl work to do that, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Well, that's a very relatable story for us, y'know.

group_1.textLeft: Really...?

group_1.textRight: We're also a bunch who are full of regrets and@inferiority complexes, you see...

group_1.textLeft: ...Those two also said they weren't confident@in themselves and wanted to change.

group_1.textRight: So, why not do the opposite of last time and@have you two join our group instead?
We're a group called the Neo-Magius.
We're working towards Magical Girl supremacy!

group_1.textLeft: ...What's that?

group_1.textRight: It means we're proud of the fact that Magical Girls@are so awesome.
And it's our goal to spread that message.

group_1.textLeft: So, what you're saying is that we're all in the@same boat, but didn't realize it?
And you won't join other groups...
But you'll welcome anyone to join you?

group_1.textRight: Which is why we can cooperate if you want.
To tell you the truth, we came across the Witch,@but we're not strong enough to take it on.
We want you to be our new members!

group_1.textLeft: Well, you're shady, and I don't really trust you.
But it's true that the sooner we solve this,@the better it will be for everybody.
What do you think, Mitsune?

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, I'm okay with it... We can try@working together...
We're not in the best position ourselves,@anyway...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, honestly, this could be a pretty good@opportunity for us...
And by the way, are you able to track the Witch@that we're after?

group_1.textRight: Yup, we can find it again.

group_1.textLeft: Then I have no objections. We'll fight it with you.

group_1.textRight: Thankiesâ˜…
